item.title: oneisall Dog Clippers with Double Blades,Cordless Small Pet Hair Grooming Trimmer,Low Noise for Trimming Dog’s Hair Around Paws, Eyes, Ears, Face, Rump (White)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand oneisall Founded in 2012 oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. “oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming. Behind the “oneisall” brand is ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $66.98 - ($58.99 / Count)
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:22 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.8 x 4.92 x 1.85 inches; 7.83 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ C61
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included)
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B089W594LC

★ Quiet and Low Vibration Design: The dog clipper’s noise when working is about 60 db,ensure your pet is comfortable throughout the grooming process,without causing him any discomfort.
★Built-in Battery: Rechargeable by USB with indicator light, make it more convenient,without changing batteries. This nail trimmer can be used for about 2 hours after 2 hours of fully charging.
★Safe and Sharp Blade & Powerful Motor:Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade can provide excellent cutting performance. Works great for trimming small areas like paws,ears and eyes.
★What You Get: oneisall dog clipper set(with one small blade and one middle blade),one cleaning brush,one USB charging cord.

How to remove and install the blade?

1.Remove the blade counter clockwise rotation;

How to remove and install the blade?

2.Pull the blade out;

How to remove and install the blade?

3.Put the blade back to the clipper;

How to remove and install the blade?

4.Install the blade clockwise rotation.

Counter clockwise

Pull out

Put it back

Clockwise

4 Steps to Do Pet Hair Grooming

1. Bathing your dog,keep it clean with no dirt;

2. Grooming with a brush,remove the dirt and knots;

3.Shave dog hairs with oneisall dog clipper.

4.Use the dog trimmer to shave the small area hair.

Read more

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Technical Details Manufacturer ‎KILMAT Brand ‎KILMAT Item Weight ‎17.6 pounds Product Dimensions ‎17 x 3 x 11 inches Country of Origin ‎Russian Federation Item model number ‎KLM5050 Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‎No Manufacturer Part Number ‎KLM5050 OEM Part Number ‎KLM5050 Position ‎Inner Additional Information ASIN B0751G6TMV Customer Reviews 4.8 out of 5 stars 6,694 ratings ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Technical Details

Manufacturer ‎KILMAT
Brand ‎KILMAT
Item Weight ‎17.6 pounds
Product Dimensions ‎17 x 3 x 11 inches
Country of Origin ‎Russian Federation
Item model number ‎KLM5050
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‎No
Manufacturer Part Number ‎KLM5050
OEM Part Number ‎KLM5050
Position ‎Inner

Additional Information

ASIN B0751G6TMV
Customer Reviews

4.8 out of 5 stars

6,694 ratings

4.8 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #3,489 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive)
#6 in Automobile Insulation
Date First Available August 22, 2017

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $81.24 - $76.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:23 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The cost effective 50 mil (1.3 mm) automotive butyl and foil sound deadening! You are not just buying an excellent quality product but also saving more than 20% comparing to competitors as well!
Now everyone can easily eliminate the annoying road noise in the vehicle. We’ve designed the product that pretty efficiently handles the rattle and reduces noise while being affordable to almost everyone. KILMAT would deaden the entire car for the same money that would be enough to only insulate the doors using the expensive brands material.
Automotive self-adhesive insulation consists of butyl. KILMAT sound deadening has a total weight of 0.35 lbs/1sqft (1.75 kg/1 sqm). This weight ensures optimum efficiency and sound insulation that could be possibly gained from 50 mil (1.3 mm) thickness material. KILMAT 50 mil (1.3 mm) is light weighted sound deadening material!
Car insulation KILMAT has a special indicator as to if it is installed correctly. The special embossing on the foil must be rolled out with a roller till it is plain smooth, then you’ll be 100% sure that the soundproofing is set correctly and professionally! The sound dampening material comes in handy size sheets which make it easier in terms of cutting and installation process!
Sound deadening material specifications: Nominal thickness 50 mil (1.3 mm); Total coverage area of 50 sq.feet (4.7 sqm); Number of sheets in the stack 47; Nominal sheet Size 9.8×15.7 inch (250x 400 mm). Roller is not included.

5
Price: $81.24 - $76.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:23 UTC – Details)

item.title: Panasonic Link2Cell Bluetooth DECT 6.0 Expandable Cordless Phone System with Answering Machine and Enhanced Noise Reduction – 5 Handsets – KX-TGE675B (Black)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Product Dimensions 7.8 x 3.9 x 6.7 inches Item Weight 3.15 pounds ASIN B08NWCW5XH Item model number KX-TGE675B Batteries 10 AAA batteries required. (included) Customer Reviews 4.4 out of 5 stars 208 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars Best Sellers Rank #832 in Office Products (See Top 100 in Office Products) #7 in Landline Phones ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Product Dimensions 7.8 x 3.9 x 6.7 inches
Item Weight 3.15 pounds
ASIN B08NWCW5XH
Item model number KX-TGE675B
Batteries 10 AAA batteries required. (included)
Customer Reviews

4.4 out of 5 stars

208 ratings

4.4 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #832 in Office Products (See Top 100 in Office Products)
#7 in Landline Phones
Date First Available September 26, 2020
Manufacturer Panasonic

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $169.99 - $149.78
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:36 UTC – Details)


This 5 Handset Cordless Phone has a digital answering maching and dual keypad. Hear who’s calling from across the room with talking Caller ID announcements in English and Spanish from the based unit and cordless handsets. Easily block up to 1000 telemarketers with one-touch dedicated call block buttons on base and handsets. Link to Siri, Google or S Voice with the Remote Voice Assist.
BI Lingual Caller ID: Talking caller ID audibly announces caller information in either English or Spanish from the telephone’s base unit and cordless handsets when you can’t view the screen
One Touch Telephone Call Block: Register up to 1000 numbers with one touch call block on the cordless phone base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with hearing Aid T Coil (TIA 1083 compliant)
Panasonic Voice Paging: More than a traditional intercom, voice paging sends clear simultaneous announcements to all cordless handsets at once; Talk Time: 10 hours max
Enhanced cordless phone sound quality noise reduction automatically suppresses background interference while enhancing voice tones for clearer conversation on the base unit & cordless handsets
Secure Long Range phone Signal DECT 6.0 wireless technology offers a long range cordless phone and is ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls

KX-TGE675B

5 Handsets Cordless Phone System with Link2Cell

Make working from home easier and stress-free with the smart, easy-to-use KX-TGE675B cordless phone system. Connect to a cell phone via Bluetooth for landline-level clarity on mobile calls. Robust,1-step Call Block helps you avoid nuisance callers, and many other features provide daily convenience.

Link2Cell Technology

Make and receive cellphone calls

Pair up to 2 cell phones via Bluetooth with the base unit to get increased call clarity and reliability, avoiding cell dead zones in your home. The handsets alert you when your cell phone receives incoming calls and texts and allow you to make and receive mobile phone calls with landline clarity.

Automated Call Block + One-Touch Call Block

Talk to people, not computers. Automated Call Block stops robocallers from getting through by prompting callers to press “1” to connect their call. Plus, you can easily block other unwanted callers (up to 1000 numbers) with the touch the Call Block button

Designed for Ease-of-Use

This phone is packed with easy-to-use design features. A large 1.88-in display + large button backlit keypad makes it easy to dial and see call info. Turned off the ringer? A bright LED flashes when there’s an incoming call. Volume too low? Use the side volume button to quickly adjust, even mid-call

Expand Your System

Keep additional handsets virtually anywhere you need in your home, expanding your phone system up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately).

Digital Answering System

Missed a call? Get message notifications even if you're away from home, or retrieve messages easily from the handset; up to 18 minutes of record time.

Noise-Free Talking & Listening

Noise reduction technology lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly.

Store Important Numbers

Phonebook stores up to 100 important numbers. Caller ID displays up to 50 entries.

Bilingual Taking Caller ID

Caller ID displays in English or Spanish and announces caller information in the language you choose, so you never miss an important call.

Long Battery Life with Low Battery Alert

Enjoy up to 10 hours talk time and 5 days of standby on handsets (while in eco mode). And, you never have to worry about the handset running out of power - audible alerts and visual icons make sure you know when it's time to charge.

Panasonic Cordless Phones Features Comparison

KX-TGE675B

KX-TGE66x Series Phones

KX-TGE64x Series Phones

KX-TGE63x Series Phones

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:08 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 7.52 x 2.44 inches; 1.23 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 26225202-003DE
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required.
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01HRSZRXM

Safe and Sharp Blade. Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance. The blade sharp enough for a long time using. Detachable blades,easy to change and clean.
Low vibration and ultra quiet design.The noise when working is only about 50 db, to help the pet feel at ease, not afraid cut hair any more.
6 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm/15mm/18mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
Please Note: if your pets get long and thick hair, you need to use scissors cut shorter at first, otherwise the clippers may jam up and don’t work properly.

Safe and Sharp Blade

Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance and long life.

Wireless and Rechargeable

Rechargeable dog clippers with built-in battery. It can be used cordless and also used when charging.

Detachable Blades

Detachable blade for ease of changing and cleaning,which offer ultimate grooming versatility.

Make Grooming Easy

Inclued a stainless steel scissor,a stainless steel comb,a oil bottle and 6 guide guards (3mm, 6mm, 9mm, 12mm,15mm and 18mm).

Product Description

For over 30 years, Supersonic is a manufacturer in Consumer and Mobile Electronics. Success has been derived from our core mission statement: To provide Design, Value and Quality products, which ensure years of ultimate entertainment experience for our consumers.

We strive to offer innovative and quality products that fit into every individual lifestyle. With collaboration from our partners, suppliers and customers, Supersonic is continuously making an effort to satisfy the consumer’s current electronic needs.

SuperSonic LED Widescreen HDTV SERIES

Enjoy stunning picture quality and feel like your right in the middle of the action with this LED HDTV.

SuperSonic HDTV brings you a crisp 1080p picture quality for stunning detail and contrast. The colors projected from the monitor contains a spectrum of vibrant colors. Enjoy your shows almost anywhere! Our TVs are designed to be perfect for any location, such as your kitchen or desk. It is also the perfect size for any RV owner! Our TVs contain HDMI, USB, and AC/DC ports. This feature allows you to freely use your Firestick or similar hardware to browse thousands of channels and apps such as Netflix, Hulu, HBO, Showtime, and more. SuperSonic HDTV is compatible with Amazon Firestick and many others such as video game consoles. Built-in ports makes this a versatile system. With PC inputs our TV’s allows you to use your TV as a computer monitor. The screen size and resolution make for a great PC experience!

What’s in the Box:

Remote ControlAC Power AdapterUser Manual

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $299.00 - $255.46
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:56 UTC – Details)


1.SYLVOX 24-inch DC flat-screen TV, built-in DVD player, with a base, and high-resolution digital noise, suitable for RVs travel and home use.
2 .10.5V~28V full range wide voltage protection, which can effectively deal with the influence of unstable power supply voltage in the car on the TV when the RV starts and stops. Support DC voltage 12v/24v power supply, or use the attached adapter to connect to a home AC voltage 110v power supply.
With anti-reverse connection technology, when the positive and negative poles of the DC power supply are reversed, the TV will not be short-circuited, which effectively protects the TV.
3.Built-in dual 5W speaker cabinet , to provide high-quality sound. The square base bracket is earthquake-resistant . Designed for light motorhomes, caravans, motorhomes, boats, bedrooms, kitchens and home use
4 .HDMI and USB port for connection to USB or hard drive for recording and playback program file, or through the HDMI connection VAST box or media player. With a built-in DVD player, you can watch your favorite movies.
5. One-key scanning: Sylvox RV TV can be easily used in mobile environments such as boats and RVs . A simple function- SCAN is added to the remote control . When moving to a new location, just press the “Scan” button, and the TV will pass and retune to the new location and get all the channels in the new area.

We include a 100-240V adapter and a 12V cigarette lighter, so you can power it directly from a 12V socket, or you can power it throgh the adapter in the bedroom, kitchen.
The square base bracket has good shock resistance and can withstand bumps, potholes, and uneven roads.

Specification:
Resolution: 1920 x 1080 HD
Tuner: ATSC
Connection method: USB HDMI VGA
Voltage range: 10.5-28V DC
Aspect ratio: 16:9
Brightness: 220 cd/m2
Wall mount VESA : 100 x 100mm
Product size: 548.78*48.60*366.26mm
Standard: ATSC
Refresh rate: 60Hz
Power: 34w
Viewing angle: 178°H/178°V
Weight: 3.2Kg
Ports: EARPHONE, DC, HDMI, VGA, PC AUDIO, AV, YPBPR, AUDIO OUT, TV, COAX, USB
Accessories: remote control (including battery), power cable, adapter, square base, screws, manual, cigarette lighter.
DVD player supports DVD/VCD/CD discs, does not support playing Blu-ray discs.
Multiple Protection Design : Full HD TV support DC 12v/24v (DC wide voltage 10.5V-28V ) power supply, recoil protection (when the voltage changes sharply, it can become flat and will not damage the circuit), reverse connection protection (No short circuit even if the positive and negative terminals are reversed)
Excellent experience: 12 volt TV Built-in DVD, integrated ASTC tuner, with USB, HDMI, VGA port, cabinet speaker, minimal sound staining, reduced distortion, excellent broadband sound effect. 178°H/178°V ultra-wide viewing angle experience. With square bracket base, cigarette lighter, adapter and other accessories.
Use place: Travel and home Both, suitable for traveling campers with, trailers, RVs and home bedrooms, kitchens, lounges and other places of the perfect TV, through the included adapter to convert the home AC power to DC power to power the TV, thereby achieve home use effect.
Anti-seismic design, passed the 4G vibration test.6 pin DC port Anti-drop design, the plug is not easy to fall in the process of vibration.
High-definition TV: Resolution 1920 x 1080 Full HD picture quality, full high definition LCD TV, ELED backlight, slim and light weight body. High-performance 16 : 9 aspect ratio LCD panel, 8bit color panel with 16.7 million colors.
DVD player supports DVD/VCD/CD discs, does not support playing Blu-ray discs.

SYLVOX

SYLVOX is the brand of an American company that provides quality products and services to tens of millions of users worldwide.

item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 30,2022 01:58:01 UTC – Details)

Product Description

PREFESSIONAL QUIET MOTOR

√ Low Noise Design

√ Lower Than 50db

√ Make It Easy For Your Pet

SHARP KNIFE

Professional Ceramic Knife Head

√ Durable

√ Sharp

√ No Fever

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 1

It’s not easy to trim the whole face. You can try to start with the dog’s eyebrows. Scissors should not be pointed at the eyes, so as not to hurt the eyes when the dog is in disorder.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 2

Lip edges and long mandibular hair are useless and can affect the appearance. They should be cut off. When pruning, press its lips first, so as not to cause damage by sudden turbulence.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 3

Pay attention to trimming the dog’s ear hairs. Hollowing out the inner hair of the ear can make the dog feel as comfortable as possible in the hot summer.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 4

Trim the ear properly. If you want it to look round, don’t cut it too short around the ear roots, depending on your preferences.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.31 x 5.51 x 2.8 inches; 15.84 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 30, 2007
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Highdas
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07SSRDCHT

★RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES – Rechargeable clippers can make it flexible for you. It is no problem to use when charging, don’t worry, and it is safe and will not stop working.
★SAFE AND SHARP BLADE – It is suitable for the most skin-friendly grooming experience, and thanks to the precision-cut titanium blades, there’s no uncomfortable pulling at your pet’s hair.
★EASY TO USE AND ADJUSTABLE – We have 4 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
★PAY ATTENTION – Using the scissors to cut the hair shorter first if your pet has a extremely long and thick hair cause it will make the clippers get stuck and stop working.
